Trade/Device Name(s): BD Veritor System for Rapid Detection of Flu A+B (Laboratory Kit)
BD Veritor System Flu A+B assay
Specimen Container(s): Prefilled unitized tube containing RV Reagent C
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Veritor System for Rapid Detection of Flu A+B Laboratory Kit, a rapid chromatographic immunoassay for direct qualitative detection of influenza A and B nucleoprotein antigens from respiratory specimens
Indications for Use Summary: Aid in the diagnosis of influenza A and B infections via direct, qualitative detection of viral nucleoprotein antigens in nasopharyngeal wash, aspirate, and swab specimens from symptomatic patients; differentiates influenza A from B in a single processed sample using a single device
